opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ministry of Defense and Support for the Armed Forces of the Islamic Republic of Iran v. Elahi

opinion:
544 U.S. 998

MINISTRY OF DEFENSE AND SUPPORT FOR THE ARMED FORCES OF THE ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF IRAN
v.
ELAHI.

No. 04-1095.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 25, 2005.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
